# CSE Recruitment Marketing Tender

## Tender Information

*   **Tender Reference**: WS3782703200
*   **Publication Date**: December 8, 2022
*   **Close Date**: January 5, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
*   **Contract Award Date**: January 31, 2023
*   **Contract End Date**: January 31, 2024
*   **Contract Extension Period**: Three optional one-year periods

## Tender Description

The Communications Security Establishment (CSE) is seeking a marketing firm to provide recruitment marketing services, including campaign design and execution. The objective of these services is to:

*   Increase awareness of CSE and its job opportunities
*   Enhance the organization's reputation as an employer of choice
*   Promote equity, diversity, and inclusion

## Selection Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on their technical merit and price. The selection of the successful candidate will be based on the highest combined score. 

## Contracting Entity

The tender is issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Communications Security Establishment (CSE).

## End User Entity

The Communications Security Establishment (CSE) will be the end recipient of the services provided.

## Contact Information

For any queries regarding this tender, please contact:
Marc-André Leblanc (SPAC/PSPC)
 Phone: [None]
Email: marc-andre.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
 

This tender follows the Canadian Trade Agreement (CFTA). Suppliers are invited to submit their proposals electronically through Merx MAS.

**Note**: Please check that you have included all required fields before confirming that your submission is ready for evaluation. Also, follow the instructions on how to submit a proposal. Your response to the issued tender must reach the end-user entity by January 5, 2023, at 2:00 P.M. local time. Only submissions made through the prescribed methods will be considered.
